attributes.action: Stop the exemption of VAT on hot foods for supermarkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How come all Hot Food Takeaways,ie Fish & Chip Shop. Have to charge 17.5% VAT on a Hot Food Sale when the supermarkets sell hot food like chicken and ribs and other VATable items and dont charge the VAT rate. 

We would like a fairer system to be put in place,and for this problem to be resolved as soon as possible. 

Our customers are being led to believe that supermarkets are cheaper because they are paying ZERO VAT on a luxury product.

With over 10,000 Fish & Chip shops and many thousands of other Hot food outlets this needs to be rectified.

Sign this pettition if you would like a farier system to be put in place, is it fair that there is one rule that some adhere to and others break.
